title: Unable to Start a Game
body:
[RESOLVED] 
Every time I go to play a game, nothing happens, and I'm returned to the main menu with the "PLAY" button still sitting there. Just started occurring a minute ago.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is having a hard time establishing a solid link to the matchmaking servers. I would recommend hitting up our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network configuration is compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jQf6tweg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-30T21:59:57.631+0000)
>
> It sounds like your client is having a hard time establishing a solid link to the matchmaking servers. I would recommend hitting up our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network configuration is compatible with League.
> 
> Let me know if those steps helped.

It stopped doing that after a little while, but thank you.
